mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (sender_id, receiver_id, msg_content, msg_sent_at, msg_read, sender_msg_status, receiver_msg_status) VALUES (#{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, #{msg_content}, #{msg_sent_at}, #{msg_read},"N","N")
mapper.select: SELECT msg_idx,sender_id,receiver_id,msg_content,msg_sent_at,msg_read, sender_msg_status, receiver_msg_status FROM message WHERE sender_id = #{sender_id} AND sender_msg_status = "N" ORDER BY msg_sent_at DESC

SELECT m.msg_idx, m.sender_id, m.receiver_id, m.msg_content, m.msg_sent_at, m.msg_read, m.sender_msg_status, m.receiver_msg_status FROM message m LEFT JOIN member_block mb ON m.sender_id = mb.blocked_id AND mb.blocker_id = #{receiver_id} WHERE m.receiver_id = #{receiver_id} AND m.receiver_msg_status = 'N' AND mb.blocked_id IS NULL ORDER BY m.msg_sent_at DESC
SELECT msg_idx,sender_id,receiver_id,msg_content,msg_sent_at, msg_read, sender_msg_status, receiver_msg_status FROM message WHERE msg_idx=#{msg_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET receiver_msg_status="D" WHERE msg_idx = #{msg_idx}
UPDATE message SET sender_msg_status="D" WHERE msg_idx = #{msg_idx}
UPDATE message SET receiver_msg_status="S" WHERE msg_idx = #{msg_idx}
UPDATE message SET sender_msg_status="S" WHERE msg_idx = #{msg_idx}
UPDATE message SET msg_read = true WHERE msg_idx = #{msg_idx}
